verse.name: v1
c
v2
verse.lines: Saved! saved! saved! by grace and grace alone; Oh, what wondrous love to me was shown, In my stead Christ Jesus bled and died, Bore my sins, for me was crucified.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Saved! saved! saved! oh, joy beyond compare! Christ my life, and I His constant care; Yielding all and trusting Him alone, Living now each moment as His own.
